a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://256c8c8af5eb072bc473226ab2b2187149b8fc04f5f4a4820db22527f5ce8e3c","dweb:/ipfs/QmRvi5BhnL7Rxf85KrJhwM6RRhukm4tzoctRdgQEheNyiN"]}},"version":1}

didBorrowerDefault(address).details: (SCALING_FACTOR) is included to maintain the accuracy of the arithmetic operations

params._poolID: address of the pool from which borrower borrowed

returns._0: bool indicating whether the borrower has defaulted

params._poolID: The address of the pool for which we want the current instalment interval

getCurrentLoanInterval(address).details: adding SCALING_FACTOR to add 1. Considering base itself as (SCALING_FACTOR)

params._poolID: The address of the pool for which we want the current loan interval
The address of the pool for which we want the completed instalments

params._scaledUpTime: scaled time for which interest is calculated

params._poolID: address of the pool for which we want to calculate interest

returns._0: Loan Duration Covered and the interest per second

params._poolID: The address of the pool for which we want the interest

returns._0: scaled interest due till instalment deadline

getInterestLeft(address).details: (SCALING_FACTOR) is included to maintain the accuracy of the arithmetic operations

params._poolID: address of the pool for which we want to calculate remaining interest
The address of the pool for which we want the next instalment deadline

returns._0: timestamp before which next instalment ends
Scaled up (by SCALING_FACTOR) duration for which _amount can repay interest for the Pool

initialize(address,uint128,uint128).details: Since we cannot use constructors when using OpenZeppelin Upgrades, we use the initialize function and the initializer modifier makes sure that this function is called only once

params._gracePenaltyRate: The penalty rate levied in the grace period
params._gracePeriodFraction: The fraction of repayment interval that will be allowed as grace period
params._poolFactory: The address of the pool factory

initializeRepayment(uint64,uint256,uint2.details: Imported from RepaymentStorage.sol repayConstants is a mapping(address => repayConstants)

params.borrowRate: The rate at which lending took place
params.lentAsset: The address of the asset that was lent (basically a ERC20 token address)
params.loanStartTime: The starting time of the loan
params.numberOfTotalRepayments: The total number of repayments that will be required from the borrower
params.repaymentInterval: Intervals after which repayment will be due

isGracePenaltyApplicable(address).details: (SCALING_FACTOR) is included to maintain the accuracy of the arithmetic operations

params._poolID: address of the pool for which we want to inquire if grace penalty is applicable or not

returns._0: boolean value indicating if applicable or not

repay(address,uint256).details: (SCALING_FACTOR) is included to maintain the accuracy of the arithmetic operations

repayPrincipal(address).details: (SCALING_FACTOR) is included to maintain the accuracy of the arithmetic operations

params._gracePenaltyRate: value of grace penality rate multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR

params._gracePeriodFraction: updated value of gracePeriodFraction multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR

didBorrowerDefault(address).notice: Checks if the borrower has defaulted

getCurrentInstalmentInterval(address).notice: This function determine the current instalment interval

getCurrentLoanInterval(address).notice: This function determines the current (loan) interval

getGracePeriodFraction().notice: Returns the fraction of repayment interval decided as the grace period fraction

getInstalmentsCompleted(address).notice: This function determines the number of completed instalments

getInterest(address,uint256).notice: returns interest for specific scaled up time

getInterestCalculationVars(address).notice: Returns the loanDurationCovered till now and the interest per second which will help in interest calculation

getInterestDueTillInstalmentDeadline(add.notice: This function determines the interest that is due for the borrower till the current instalment deadline

getInterestLeft(address).notice: Determines entire interest remaining to be paid for the loan issued to the borrower

getInterestPerSecond(address).notice: returns SCALED UP interest per second for the specific pool

getNextInstalmentDeadline(address).notice: This function determines the timestamp of the next instalment deadline

getRepaidDuration(address,uint256).notice: returns scaled up duration for which specified amount can repay interest for a specific pool

getTotalRepaidAmount(address).notice: Returns the total amount that has been repaid by the borrower till now

gracePenaltyRate().notice: Penalty interest rate applied during grace period

gracePeriodFraction().notice: Fraction of repayment interval for which grace period is allowed

initialize(address,uint128,uint128).notice: Initializes the contract (similar to a constructor)

initializeRepayment(uint64,uint256,uint2.notice: For a valid pool, the repayment schedule is being initialized here

isGracePenaltyApplicable(address).notice: Check if grace penalty is applicable or not

repay(address,uint256).notice: Used to for your overdues, grace penalty and interest

repayConstants(address).notice: used to maintain the constants related to repayment against a pool

repayPrincipal(address).notice: Used to pay off the principal of the loan, once the overdues and interests are repaid

repayVariables(address).notice: used to maintain the variables related to repayment against a pool

updateGracePenaltyRate(uint128).notice: used to update grace penality rate

updateGracePeriodFraction(uint128).notice: used to update grace period as a fraction of repayment interval

updatePoolFactory(address).notice: used to update pool factory address

@notice Penalty interest rate applied during grace period
 @dev multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR to maintain precision

@notice Fraction of repayment interval for which grace period is allowed
 @dev multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR to maintain precision
@notice used to maintain the variables related to repayment against a pool
@notice used to maintain the constants related to repayment against a pool

@notice modifier used to determine whether the current pool is valid or not
 @dev poolRegistry from IPoolFactory interface returns a bool
@notice modifier used to check if msg.sender is the owner

@notice used to update pool factory address
 @param _poolFactory address of pool factory contract

@notice used to update grace period as a fraction of repayment interval
 @param _gracePeriodFraction updated value of gracePeriodFraction multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR

@notice used to update grace penality rate
 @param _gracePenaltyRate value of grace penality rate multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR

@notice Returns the fraction of repayment interval decided as the grace period fraction
 @return grace period fraction
